provenance.snippet: In early 2025, Luminance raised $75 million in Series C funding. The company has been featured in Forbes’ AI 50 List, Inc. 5000 Fastest-Growing Companies in America, and was named Best AI Product for Legal at the CogX Awards.

events.title: Series C Funding
events.description: Luminance raised $75 million in Series C funding to further enhance its AI technology and expand its market presence.

provenance.snippet: In early 2025, Luminance raised $75 million in Series C funding. The company has been featured in Forbes’ AI 50 List, Inc. 5000 Fastest-Growing Companies in America, and was named Best AI Product for Legal at the CogX Awards.

Luminance’s Legal-Grade™ AI automates and augments every touchpoint a business has with its contracts. Today, more than 700 organizations across 70 countries use Luminance, including all of the Big Four consultancy firms, over a quarter of the Global Top 100 law firms, and global companies such as AMD, BBC Studios, Hitachi, Liberty Mutual and Koch Industries.

products.name: AI-Powered Checklists
products.description: Luminance’s AI-Powered Checklists help teams navigate negotiations more quickly, confidently and compliantly than ever before.

provenance.snippet: Earlier this year, we introduced ‘AI-Powered Checklists’ helping teams across any business navigate negotiations more quickly, confidently and compliantly than ever before.

Eleanor is Chief Executive Officer at Luminance. Previously a Director at leading cyber AI company Darktrace, she founded and grew the company’s operations in Africa before serving as the Global Head of the Darktrace Industrial Division.

leadership.name: Daniel Lumby
leadership.education: Economics and Spanish from Durham University

provenance.snippet: Daniel is Chief Operating Officer at Luminance, where he oversees a broad range of responsibilities including helping to drive business growth, developing go-to-market strategy, and implementing effective internal processes.

leadership.name: Adam Guthrie
leadership.education: MA in Mathematics from the University of Cambridge

provenance.snippet: Adam Guthrie is the Co-Founder and Chief Technical Architect at Luminance, he leads the customer-focused technical aspects of the company.

leadership.name: Dr Graham Sills
leadership.education: PhD in Computational Number Theory from Trinity College, Cambridge

provenance.snippet: Graham is the Co-Founder and Director of AI at Luminance, where he runs the R&D team and develops the AI underlying Luminance’s capabilities.
Luminance has been featured in Forbes’ AI 50 List, Inc. 5000 Fastest-Growing Companies in America, and was named Best AI Product for Legal at the CogX Awards.
